bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.sequence.event

Class DSelectionListenerSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.sequence.event.DSelectionListenerSupport

  • public class DSelectionListenerSupport
extends Object
    This class can be used to handle sequence selection messages between several sequence viewers.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

      Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • setSelectedSequenceRange

        public void setSelectedSequenceRange(Object src,
                            DSequence seq,
                            int from,
                            int to)
        Select a range of residues.
        Parameters:
        src - the object that emitted the selection message
        seq - the sequence on which the selection has been made
        from - starting position
        to - ending position

      • setSelectionRanges

        public void setSelectionRanges(Object src,
                      DSequence seq,
                      List<DLocation> locs)
        Select a list of ranges.
        Parameters:
        src - the object that emitted the selection message
        seq - the sequence on which the selection has been made
        locs - the list of ranges that were selected
